metadata.synopsis: One of the spawns grabs Astarion and teleports to Cazador's Palace with him.He says this phrase before leaving.If he is the last spawn left, he promises punishment later.If other spawns are present, he tells them to dispatch the rest of the party.

0.speaker: Aurelia, Leon, Violet, Yousen
0.text: Come brother, it's time to go home.
0.context: NodeContext: Grabbed an unconscious Astarion and is about to teleport away

1.speaker: Aurelia, Leon, Violet, Yousen
1.text: I'll take Astarion to the master. The rest of you - deal with the witnesses.
1.context: NodeContext: You're about to teleport away with an unconscious person and telling your friends to keep fighting
